code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec lexicographically_smallest_array(nums :: [integer], limit :: integer) :: [integer]
  def lexicographically_smallest_array(nums, limit) do
    list_length = length(nums)
    0..list_length-1
    |> Enum.reduce(nums, fn i, acc ->
      min_pos = Enum.reduce(i..list_length-1, i, fn j, min_pos ->
        if abs(Enum.at(acc, i) - Enum.at(acc, j)) <= limit and Enum.at(acc, j) < Enum.at(acc, min_pos), do: j, else: min_pos
      end)
      if min_pos != i, do: List.replace_at(acc, i, Enum.at(acc, min_pos)) |> List.replace_at(min_pos, Enum.at(acc, i)), else: acc
    end)
  end
end
